authorCommits.message:
[AVO-597] Boolean field: optional toggle UI (#4024)

* optional toggle UI for boolean edit component [AVO-597]

* added a comment

* added a controller

* implemented reviewed changes

* removed an unnecessary comment

* rm unnecessary common_checkbox_attrs variable

* delegate :as_toggle?, to: :@field

* use `class_names` for `checkbox_classes`

* use `common_check_attributes` to wrap all attributes

* use class with tw instead style tag

* considerable refactor where JS compexity is removed in favor of tw classes

* rm _checkbox prefix from input

* label fix

* fix test & id & label

---------

Co-authored-by: Paul Bob <69730720+Paul-Bob@users.noreply.github.com>
Co-authored-by: Paul Bob <paul.ionut.bob@gmail.com>
